sections.text:
49-1451.Statement of organization; change; late filing fee.

When any of the information required in a statement of organization is changed, such change shall be reported when the next campaign statement is required to be filed. Any person who fails to report a change to the commission under this section shall pay to the commission a late filing fee of twenty-five dollars for each day the change remains not reported in violation of this section, not to exceed seven hundred fifty dollars.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 987, ยง 51;Laws 1980, LB 535, ยง 8;Laws 1999, LB 416, ยง 6.
